outputs.output_descr: To include energy considerations in MDG-based National Development Strategies (NDS) and planning efforts, and as a part of the greater UNDP Integrated Package of Services (IPS) to support MDG attainment.  Also to explore what kind of energy-related actions and resources are needed to support an MDG-based NDS and finally to develop the analytical tools and methodologies to help practictioners incorporate energy strategies into the MDG/PRS framework at the country level.

project_descr: Developing Operational Tools to Integrate Energy Considerations into Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) based National Development Strategies
